products.name: Cold Foam Iced Cappuccino
products.description: Cold milk foam topped with a slightly sweetened espresso coffee of choice for a deliciously refreshing twist on your favourite drink. NB: This beverage can only be made using skimmed milk in order to guarantee best quality foam. Non-dairy alternatives are not available for this beverage.
